---
title: "Flag for age structured overall biomass output txt files"
date: "2012-05-15"
author: "Fulton, Beth (Environment, Hobart)"
---

To get age structured versions of the overall biom.txt file go to run.prm and set

flag_age_output  1        # 1 = age structured overall biomass output desired, 0 = off
